title: On of the best
review: I can't remember when i first saw Raiders of the lost ark. I grew up watching the amazing Indiana Jones in his adventures. I know by heart every little line that all the three movies have. I wish Spielberg, one of my favourite producers, made a fourth version of Indiana adventures.

title: Suberb
review: One of the most brillant film I've ever seen. Hannibal Lecter really can 'touch' us. In the night I've seen The Silence of the Lambs I couldn't sleep. Just suberb!
